Package Restaurant

Class Table

java.lang.Object
Restaurant.Table
public class Table extends Object
this is an entity class the instance of this object represents a single table

  • Constructor Summary

    Table(int tableNum, int capacity)
    when new Table is created, pax is set to 0 as no one is occupying it, and status is set to FREE

    • deleteReservationFromHashMap

      public void deleteReservationFromHashMap(LocalDateTime dateTime, int tel) throws IOException
      deletes reservations when the dateTime and telephone number is inserted enables people to call and cancel reservations
      Parameters:
      dateTime - dateTime of reservation to be cancelled
      tel - telephone number of reservation to be cancelled
      Throws:
      IOException

    • occupyTable

      public void occupyTable(int pax)
      assigns table by changing to OCCUPIED enum and assigning pax
      Parameters:
      pax - number of people to be seated. stored here to be retrieved during payment

    • freeTable

      public void freeTable()
      frees a table by changing to FREE enum and making pax 0
